original_title: No Te Va Gustar - Lejos De Los Focos
overview: Lejos De Los Focos is a story of a particular moment in the life of No Te Va Gustar that at the same time is part of a very complex and unique year for everyone. It accurately and honestly describes the details and processes of the record that saved them as a band, reunited them as a family, and gave them hope to put a concert tour back together and play live.
title: No Te Va Gustar - Lejos De Los Focos
